General.Name: Viet Capital Securities JSC
General.Description: Viet Capital Securities Joint Stock Company operates as a securities company in Vietnam and internationally. The company offers securities brokerage and trading, underwriting, and asset management services, as well as advisory services for securities investment. It also provides merger and acquisition, capital mobilizing, stock and bond issuing, and business restructuring consultancy, as well as guarantee issuance and listing services; institutional client brokerage services, including sales and dealing, equities and fixed income, listed and OTC, IPOs, off-market, corporate access, and custody; margin lending services; and research and analysis reports on companies, industry, economy, bonds, and strategy. The company serves enterprises, financial institutions, and individuals. Viet Capital Securities Joint Stock Company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
